location.NAME: Pecan Pie Vending Machine
location.DESCRIPTION: A 24-hour vending machine restocked daily with homemade full-sized pecan pies.
location.ADDRESS: 2626 TX-71 Cedar Creek, Texas, 78612 United States

location.NAME: Cadillac Ranch
location.DESCRIPTION: CADILLAC RANCH, BUILT IN 1974, is the product of eccentric helium millionaire Stanley Marsh 3 (he didn't like the Roman numeral III and found it pretentious). In collaboration with The Ant Farm, a San Francisco art collective, Marsh funded the placement of ten graffiti-covered Cadillacs half-buried in a dusty Texas field. The cars are positioned nose-down and face west “at the same angle as the Cheops' pyramids.” The cars were actually moved two miles further out in 1997 to avoid the expanding city.

location.NAME: Munster Mansion
location.DESCRIPTION: A Victorian mansion, painstakingly reproduced to appear just as the the Munster's family home did on TV.
location.ADDRESS: F.M 813 1313 Mockingbird Lane Waxahachie, Texas, 75165 United States
